episodes.title: "I Was In A Religious Cult"- Shakira Thomas
episodes.description: This week we speak to Jam's younger sister and published author Shakira Thomas about spending 14 years in a South Korean religious cult, how it affected her mentally and how freeing it was once she left. She also offers up advice to anyone who may think they're in a cult Feel free to leave any thoughts in the comment section below To buy her book 'Church or Cult?,' go to https://bit.ly/4eG2woy Follow @YouGoodBroPodcast on Instagram for more content and don't forget to rate and subscribe!
